_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Add devices from SmartThings to Homey

hint.en: This card starts a Flow when the X Vector changes.
This card starts a Flow when the Y Vector changes.
This card starts a Flow when the Z Vector changes.
This card starts a Flow when acceleration is detected or no longer detected.
This card starts a Flow when the water is detected or no longer detected.
This card starts a Flow when the the status of the button changes.

title.en: The door is opened or closed

hint.en: This card starts a Flow when the door is opened or closed.
This card starts a Flow when the dryer switches to the selected mode.

title.en: The dust filter status has changed

hint.en: This card starts a Flow when the dust filter status changes.
This card starts a Flow when the presence status changes.
This card starts a Flow when the the status of the button changes.
This card starts a Flow when the washing machine switches to the selected mode.
This Flow will continue if the door is/is not currently open.

titleFormatted.en: Set the AC Cleaning Mode to [[ac_auto_cleaning_option]]

Change the media input source to [[media_input_source]]
Change the number of rinse cycles to [[rinse_cycles]]
Change the washer spin level to [[spin_level]]
